Name: Agent
Description: Entity representing individuals or groups of individuals, that hold economic resources and exchange them in financial transactions.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Attributes
Properties.Description: A collection of entries that allows to define entity' structure.

Properties.Name: EntityBehaviours
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing how the entity behaves.

Properties.Name: DataBehaviours
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing how the entity' data is stored and retrieved.

Properties.Name: BehaviourNamespaces
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing the coding namespaces to be included (as usings) on code generated with your data and entity behaviours.

Properties.Name: DataSource
Properties.Description: The Data Source in which the entities are computed and/or persisted.

Name: ApplicationBehaviour
Description: Behaviour used to extend the application, which execution can be triggered from another behaviour (entity or data) or directly (using the API).

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Expression
Properties.Description: The C# code that will be executed.

Properties.Name: BehaviourNamespaces
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing the coding namespaces to be included (as usings) on code generated.

Properties.Name: DataSource
Properties.Description: The Data Source where the behaviour is executed.

Properties.Name: ExecutionLocation
Properties.Description: The location where is executed.

Name: Attribute
Description: Allow to define the structure of an entity and represents a property in the data you can read or write.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Type
Properties.Description: The data type: can be a Primitive, an Enumeration or a reference to an Entity.

Properties.Name: Multiplicity
Properties.Description: The representation of the minimum and maximum number of records.

Properties.Name: IsSystem
Properties.Description: Indicates if the attribute is generated by the platform or user-defined.

Properties.Name: IsReadOnly
Properties.Description: Indicates if the attribute’s value can be changed by the user’s input

Properties.Name: AggregationKind
Properties.Description: The nature of connection between the entity and the data type.

Properties.Name: DependsOnAttribute
Properties.Description: In Shared attributes whose Type is from a custom Data Source, indicates the attribute used to identify the Data Source.

Properties.Name: IsSensitiveData
Properties.Description: Indicates  if contains sensitive data. If so, the information can be destroyed.

Properties.Name: Length
Properties.Description: Define minimum and maximum length of attribute value.

Name: BehaviourDependency
Description: Assembly or Expression loaded to be used on behaviours.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Type
Properties.Description: The dependency type.

Properties.Name: Version
Properties.Description: The version of the dependency.

Properties.Name: ExecutionLocation
Properties.Description: The location where is loaded.

Properties.Name: Path
Properties.Description: The path from where the dependency is loaded.

Properties.Name: AssemblyName
Properties.Description: The assembly name of the dependency (when the Type is 'File')

Properties.Name: Expression
Properties.Description: The C# code that will be executed (when the Type is 'Expression').

Name: BehaviourNamespace
Description: Namespace to be included on code generated and used in behaviours.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: FullyQualifiedName
Properties.Description: The full qualified name to be loaded when the namespace is used.

Properties.Name: ExecutionLocation
Properties.Description: The location where is loaded.

Name: Commitment
Description: Promise of a transaction to trade resources, between two agents. Is made because the transaction often only happens after the moment when it is set.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Attributes
Properties.Description: A collection of entries that allows to define entity' structure.

Properties.Name: EntityBehaviours
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing how the entity behaves.

Properties.Name: DataBehaviours
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing how the entity' data is stored and retrieved.

Properties.Name: BehaviourNamespaces
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing the coding namespaces to be included (as usings) on code generated with your data and entity behaviours.

Properties.Name: DataSource
Properties.Description: The Data Source in which the entities are computed and/or persisted.

Name: DataBehaviour
Description: Behaviour representing how the entity is stored and retrieved from a Data Source.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Type
Properties.Description: The execution moment of the behaviour.

Properties.Name: Expression
Properties.Description: The C# code that will be executed.

Name: DataSource
Description: Representation of a system that allows to store entities and/or execute behaviours.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Attributes
Properties.Description: A collection of entries that allows to define entity' structure.

Properties.Name: EntityBehaviours
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing how the entity behaves.

Properties.Name: DataBehaviours
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing how the entity' data is stored and retrieved.

Properties.Name: BehaviourNamespaces
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing the coding namespaces to be included (as usings) on code generated with your data and entity behaviours.

Properties.Name: BehaviourRuntime
Properties.Description: The location where the entitys' behaviours are executed.

Properties.Name: DataAccessRuntime
Properties.Description: The location where the data behaviours are executed.

Properties.Name: ExecutesInConnector
Properties.Description: Indicates if the Data Source is executed using the platform's connector.

Properties.Name: BehaviourDependencies
Properties.Description: A collection of entries that allows to define which dependencies are loaded in the Data Source.

Name: Document

Name: EntityBehaviour
Description: Behaviour representing how the entity behaves in a specific moment and is expressed in C#.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Attribute
Properties.Description: The attribute the behaviour is related to.

Properties.Name: Type
Properties.Description: The execution moment of the behaviour.

Properties.Name: Expression
Properties.Description: The C# code that will be executed.

Name: Enumeration
Description: Representation of a collection of values.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Values
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing an entry of an enumeration.

Name: EnumerationValue
Description: Represents an entry of an enumeration.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Order
Properties.Description: The order of the value inside the enumeration.

Name: Event
Description: Transaction of resources between two agents, one in the role of supplier and the other as recipient.

Name: GenericEntity
Description: Entity required for financial transactions, in order to complement the information about them.

Name: Resource
Description: Entity representing assets that can be quantified and with commercial value. Is held by the Agents, who exchange them in financial transactions.

Properties.Name: Description

Name: Serie
Description: Representation of a sequence that allow to sequentially enumerate the documents.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Attributes
Properties.Description: A collection of entries that allows to define entity' structure.

Properties.Name: EntityBehaviours
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing how the entity behaves.

Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing how the entity' data is stored and retrieved.

Name: StateBehaviour
Description: Behaviour representing how the entity should behave during a state change.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Type
Properties.Description: The execution moment of the behaviour.

Properties.Name: Expression
Properties.Description: The C# code that will be executed.

Name: StateDecision
Description: Decision that a user can take to condition a given state machine transition.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Order
Properties.Description: Represent the relevance of the decision. Use the Order to sort the decisions.

Properties.Name: CommentType
Properties.Description: Define if a comment is required to take the decision.

Name: State
Description: Definition of an entity possible state.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: IsInitial
Properties.Description: State machine first state. One state machine can only have one initial state.

Properties.Name: DisableOperations
Properties.Description: Disable all operations when the entity is in the current state.

Properties.Name: DisableAttributes
Properties.Description: Disable all attributes when the entity is in the current state.

Properties.Name: AssignToExpression
Properties.Description: C# expression to define to whom will be assigned the record when it is in this state.

Properties.Name: Transitions
Properties.Description: Collection of transitions that can happen in the current state.

Properties.Name: Decisions
Properties.Description: Collection of decisions that the user can take in the current state.

Properties.Name: EnabledOperations
Properties.Description: Collection of operations to enable. This is an exception list when the DisableOperations configuration is active.

Properties.Name: EnabledAttributes
Properties.Description: Collection of attributes to enable. This is an exception list when the DisableAttributes configuration is active.

Properties.Name: Behaviours
Properties.Description: A collection of entries representing how the state machine behaves.

Name: StateEnabledAttribute
Description: Attribute enabled in a given state.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Path
Properties.Description: Path to the attribute to enable. When accessing to a composite collection, use the '.' to navigate.

Name: StateEnabledOperation
Description: Operation enabled in a given State.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Path
Properties.Description: Path to the operation to enable. When accessing to a composite collection, use the '.' to navigate.

Properties.Name: Type
Properties.Description: The operation type to enable.

Name: StateMachine
Description: State Machine related to a given Definition.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the state machine (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the state machine purpose.

Properties.Name: Definition
Properties.Description: the entity that will be managed using the State Machine.

Properties.Name: States
Properties.Description: A collection of states of the current State Machine.

Name: StateTransition
Description: Possible transition between two states in a State Machine.

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Description: The name of the entity (unique identifier).

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Description: The textual explanation of the entities' purpose.

Properties.Name: Order
Properties.Description: The evaluation order of transitions.

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: Target state when the transition happens.

Properties.Name: Type
Properties.Description: Type of transition.

Properties.Name: Decision
Properties.Description: User Decision that will trigger the transition in case of decision based transitions.

Properties.Name: Expression
Properties.Description: The C# code that will be executed.
